title: Sentence Reverse
content:
You are given an array of characters that consists of sequences of characters delimited by the space character. Every sequence of characters separated by the space character is a word. 

Your task is to output another array which reverses the order of the words using the most efficint algorithm.

For example, 
Input: ["c", "a", "t", " ", "a", "n", "d", " ", "d", "o", "g"]
Output: ["d", "o", "g", " ", "a", "n", "d", " ", "c", "a", "t"]
